changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `USER_BONNIE_CONNECTION` ( <<<<<<< HEAD `ID` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, ======= `ID` varchar(40) NOT NULL, >>>>>>> 7e1ad7903c31cf81221d971c56aa43c6dbd126a6 `USER_ID` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `REFRESH_TOKEN` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `ACCESS_TOKEN` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), FOREIGN KEY (`USER_ID`) REFERENCES USER(USER_ID) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
